function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Higher proportion of the population infected in Spain (15.0%)","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and spread of disease","Mitigation":"Implement strict measures such as lockdowns, social distancing, and travel restrictions","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, testing kits, and monitoring systems","People":"General population of Spain","Owner":"Government and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in initial reproduction numbers","Impact":"Difficulty in predicting and controlling the spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Improve data collection and testing, validate model assumptions, and enhance surveillance","Technologies":"Advanced data analytics, machine learning, and predictive modeling","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions and health organizations"}]}
